caption:
This guy would definitely win at #HideAndSeek!! Another 🦉 pic? Why not!?!! We tOWLd you, we just can’t get enough of them... yes OWL of THEM! This is the Western Screech-owl and he is now listed as threatened under the Species at Risk Act, due to the loss and degradation of its habitat.😔 But, we’re getting him some help!😀The Government of Canada recently finalized new protection for 11 species, marking an important step in our commitment to protecting species and biodiversity in Canada. YAY!

#WesternCanada #SpeciesAtRisk #WorldWildlifeDay #ProtectBiodiversity #Ecology #Nature #SpeciesOfInstagram #InstaOwls #OwlsOfInstagram #OwlsLovers #CanadianWilidlife #CanadianWildlifeService #SpeciesAtRiskRegistry #Canada #AnimalProtection 📸: Joe Fuhrman
